scripts.deploy: ao publish -w ~/.wallet.json process.wasm -t Memory-Limit -v 1-gb -t Compute-Limit -v 9000000000000 -t Module-Format -v wasm64-unknown-emscripten-draft_2024_02_15 -t AOS-Version -v 2.0.0 -t Name -v aos-xl
scripts.deploy-sqlite: ao publish -w ~/.wallet.json process.wasm -t Memory-Limit -v 1-gb -t Compute-Limit -v 9000000000000 -t Module-Format -v wasm64-unknown-emscripten-draft_2024_02_15 -t AOS-Version -v 2.0.0 -t Name -v sqlite-xl
